author: Spectagram_officals
caption: Spectagram now have Dark ðŸŒ‘ and Light â˜€ mode
full:
Yes , Spectagram now have Dark ðŸŒ‘ and Light â˜€ mode.
You know that Spectagram have default dark theme because at that time Spectagram App Developer think that dark mode is best.
And now Spectagram App have dark and light mode , this is a great achievement to have dark and light mode.

Now , your questions are: 
1.How to enable light mode 
2.We can back to dark mode 
3.How to find dark and light mode toggle button. 

And these are answers : 

1. It is very easy to enable dark mode , there are only 2 steps : 
1.Drag your screen at center vertically (drag left-right).And then go to profiles 
2.Scroll down and toggle the dark mode button (enable dark mode button)

2.Yes , we can back to dark mode very easily . Just turn off light mode in Profile Screen. 

3.It is easy you know that in question 1.
